medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in his normal state of health until about 36 hours prior to presentation, at which point he began having lower abdominal pain that has been persistent, with intermittent waves of worsening pain. He reported this pain as severe enough to prevent him from sleeping. He also experienced lightheadedness, nausea, and diaphoresis leading to his ED visit.
medical_history.past_medical_history: CAD s/p prior PCIs and 5vCABG, HTN, HLD, obesity, OSA on CPAP, early dementia, presyncope.
medical_history.family_history: Father died from MI, grandfather had MI, sister with breast cancer, mother had breast cancer and died from old age.
